Package JNFP

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coordinate
    the class used for storing and using a coordinate
    Edge
    The Edge class describes an edge given by a start- and endpoint it can be used to calculate various geometric aspects
    EdgeAngleComparator
    Compares the angles of edges
    EdgeNumberComparator
    Compares the edge numbers of polygons for the Minkowski sums method
    JNFP
    This class contains methods for generating the NFP given two files and returns a string describing the NFP.
    Minkowski
    This class is used in a static way to call the Minkowski sums method
    MultiPolygon
    this class contains a polygon to be used to generate the no-fit polygon.
    NoFitPolygon
    the NFP class contains an NFP describing the area of overlap for two polygons
    Orbiting
    This class is used in a static way to call the Orbiting method
    TouchingEdgePair
    Pairs of edges that are touching used in the orbiting method are stored with the coordinates of the touching point.
    TripIntersection
    Used in the Minkowski sums method.
    TripIntersectionComparator
    Used for comparisons in the Minkowski sums method
    Vector
    this class describes a vector starting in the origin
    VectorComparator
    A comparator that compares the different vectors in edgeOrder for use in the orbiting method
